2+1.sig_info: Whenever a Debuff is Purified, gain a Bulwark Passive, increasing Block Proficiency by 297.31 to 442.55 lasts 20 seconds. Max Stacks 6.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Special Attacks have +6400 Critical Rating, but base Critical Rate is 0.

When Captain Britain is struck by a Critical Hit or it hits her Block, 80% chance to inflict Exhaustion, reducing Critical Damage Rating by 369.23 for 10 seconds. Max Stack 4. This includes Exhaustion inflicted through Psionic Mode.
For each Prowess effect on Captain Britain, her Defensive Ability Accuracy is increased by 10%.
Basic attacks deal Energy Damage instead of Physical.
PSIONIC MODE: Captain Britain activates Psionic Mode when she activates a Special Attack. If it was already on, she deactivates it instead. Psionic Mode grants the following:
Gain 1600 Physical Resistance.
Deal a Burst of 43.5 Energy Damage on each hit, scaling with Base Attack only.
On the first Light Attack, inflict an Exhaustion Debuff, reducing Critical Damage Rating by 369.23 for 10 seconds.
On the second Medium Attack, inflict a non-stacking Slow Debuff for 10 seconds.
On the first hit of the Heavy Attack, inflict a non-stacking Weakness Debuff, reducing Attack Rating by 30% for 10 seconds.
PURIFICATION: Whenever Psionic Mode is activated or deactivated, Captain Britain will Purify all Exhaustion, Slow, and Weakness Debuffs off the Opponent.

Whenever a Debuff is Purified off the Opponent, gain an indefinite Passive Prowess, increasing Special Attack damage by 10%. Max Stacks 25. Captain Britain also gains an additional Buff if the Debuff was an Exhaustion, Slow, or Weakness.
Purified Exhaustions grant a Cruelty Buff for 30 second(s), increasing Critical Damage Rating by 177.78.
Purified Slows grant an Unstoppable Buff for 3 second(s). This does not trigger against Tech Opponents.
Purified Weaknesses grant a Fury Buff for 30 second(s) increasing Attack Rating by 8.7.
ALL SPECIAL ATTACKS: On Activate, Pause all of Captain Britain’s personal Buffs for 5 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain a 30% Energize Buff for 15 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Increase Attack Rating by 8.7 per Unique Buff currently on Captain Britain.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: On Activate, exit Psionic Mode, gain 1 of each Buff, and inflict 1 of each Debuff.
This Special Attack will always default to Psionic Mode off when entering or exiting.

On the second Medium Attack, inflict a non-stacking Slow Debuff for 10 seconds.
On the first hit of the Heavy Attack, inflict a non-stacking Weakness Debuff, reducing Attack Rating by 30% for 10 seconds.
PURIFICATION: Whenever Psionic Mode is activated or deactivated, Captain Britain will Purify all Exhaustion, Slow, and Weakness Debuffs off the Opponent.

Whenever a Debuff is Purified off the Opponent, gain an indefinite Passive Prowess, increasing Special Attack damage by 10%. Max Stacks 25. Captain Britain also gains an additional Buff if the Debuff was an Exhaustion, Slow, or Weakness.
Purified Exhaustions grant a Cruelty Buff for 30 second(s), increasing Critical Damage Rating by 216.67.
Purified Slows grant an Unstoppable Buff for 3 second(s). This does not trigger against Tech Opponents.
Purified Weaknesses grant a Fury Buff for 30 second(s) increasing Attack Rating by 95.8.
ALL SPECIAL ATTACKS: On Activate, Pause all of Captain Britain’s personal Buffs for 5 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain a 30% Energize Buff for 15 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Increase Attack Rating by 95.8 per Unique Buff currently on Captain Britain.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: On Activate, exit Psionic Mode, gain 1 of each Buff, and inflict 1 of each Debuff.
This Special Attack will always default to Psionic Mode off when entering or exiting.
